info.title: Brain Builder
info.description: Train your brain with this unique game that mixes logic, math, puzzles and sharpness! Try to complete all 16 games getting the highest score. Keep track of your results on the statistics and train every day in order to improve your score!

controls: 使用鼠标点击进行操作
instructions.howToPlay: 按照游戏内提示进行游戏，完成各种挑战任务。
